summary: This document outlines a purchase and sales agreement between Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust, and Granite Reality LLC for a property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH. It details the terms of sale, including the selling price, deposit amounts, and contingencies related to inspections and financing.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the seller of the property, acting as the trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.

persons.name: Margaret Weathers
persons.context: Margaret Weathers is identified as a seller's agent from Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty.

connections.description: Richard Yospin is selling the property to Granite Reality LLC as part of the purchase agreement.

events.title: Purchase Agreement Signed
events.description: The purchase and sales agreement was signed between Richard Yospin and Granite Reality LLC for the property located at 338 East Washington Road.

keyFacts: The selling price of the property is one million seventy-five thousand dollars.
A deposit of $10,000 is to be held in escrow, with an additional deposit of $90,000 due upon satisfactory inspection results.
The agreement includes contingencies for inspections and financing, with specific timelines for actions to be taken by the buyer.
